import React, {useState} from "react"; function OrderForm() { const [name, setName] = useState("") const [phone, setPhone] = useState("") const [card, setCard] = useState("") const [address, setAddress] = useState("") const [deliveryInstruction, setDeliveryInstruction] = useState("") /* might need to add to schema in backend*/ const formData = {name, phone, card, address, deliveryInstruction} return (
) } export default OrderForm;
